function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Daily growth rates of infections without policy interventions","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement policies to reduce transmission, increase testing, and promote vaccination","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing infrastructure, vaccination distribution systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in cumulative infection estimates","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the scale of infections","Mitigation":"Improve data collection and reporting, conduct widespread testing, and integrate real-time monitoring systems","Technologies":"Data analytics, real-time tracking tools, data integration platforms","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, data analysts","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, research institutions"}]}
